Uses of Package
neqsim.process.design

Packages that use neqsim.process.design
Package
Description
neqsim.process.design
Process design framework for automated equipment sizing and optimization.
neqsim.process.design.template
Process templates for common separation and compression configurations.

neqsim.process.equipment.watertreatment
Produced water treatment equipment for offshore oil and gas facilities.
  • Classes in neqsim.process.design used by neqsim.process.design
    Class
    Description
    DesignOptimizer
    Integrated design-to-optimization workflow manager.
    DesignOptimizer.ObjectiveType
    Objective types for optimization.
    DesignResult
    Result container for design optimization.
    DesignResult.ConstraintStatus
    Status of a single constraint.
    DesignSpecification
    Builder class for standardized equipment design specification.
    EquipmentConstraintRegistry
    Registry for default equipment capacity constraints.
    EquipmentConstraintRegistry.ConstraintTemplate
    Template class for constraint metadata.
    ProcessBasis
    Class representing process basis (design basis) for a process template.
    ProcessBasis.Builder
    Builder class for ProcessBasis.
    ProcessBasis.ProductSpecification
    Specification for a product stream.
    ProcessTemplate
    Interface for process templates that define standard configurations.
